item.title: Assign a Azure Subscription to a existing user
item.description: If you have logged into the Azure Management Portal and see a message like below then you need to have a azure subscription assigned to you in order to use the portal and this post is going to help you (probably your Administrator) assign a subscription to your account.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
